_comment: Focus Guard Configuration - Customize your blocked apps and schedule
_comment_deep_work: Apps that trigger auto-detect mode when focused

auto_detect._comment_auto: trigger_minutes: how long in deep work before enabling focus. cooldown_minutes: how long without deep work before disabling

schedule._comment_schedule: Set enabled to true to only block during scheduled hours

settings._comment_warn_only: If true, only show warnings. If false, close apps after grace_period_seconds
